terms.definition: A centralized repository of information, documentation, and resources that provides answers to common questions and solutions to problems within an organization
Unwritten, experiential knowledge gained through hands-on practice and observation that is difficult to document or transfer to others
Software as a Service - cloud-based software applications delivered over the internet on a subscription basis
The systematic process of capturing, organizing, storing, and sharing organizational knowledge and expertise to improve decision-making and productivity
Written or visual materials that explain how systems work, provide instructions, or preserve organizational knowledge and processes
A structured conversation with departing employees to capture their knowledge, insights, and feedback before they leave the organization
The process of moving knowledge, skills, and expertise from one person or department to another within an organization
Interactive content that includes videos, images, infographics, and other visual elements beyond plain text to enhance learning and understanding
An educational approach that uses images, videos, diagrams, and other visual aids to help people understand and retain information more effectively
The practice of exchanging information, skills, and expertise among team members or across an organization to improve collective knowledge
The systematic process of identifying, diagnosing, and resolving problems or issues in systems, processes, or equipment
Dynamic content components like clickable diagrams, embedded videos, or step-by-step visual guides that engage users actively in the learning process
A digital storage system that organizes and maintains an organization's collective information, documents, and intellectual assets for easy access and retrieval
The collective expertise, processes, and cultural understanding that exists within an organization and is often held by long-term employees
A production strategy that aims to reduce waste by receiving goods or information only as they are needed in the production process
